basic_information.scholarship_name: Kenneth Rees Endowed Scholarship in American History

description: Kenneth R. Rees was inducted into the Edmond Public Schools Foundation Hall of Fame in 2013. He helped launch the Edmond Public Schools Foundation and the Fine Arts Institute of Edmond. This scholarship, established by Edmond philanthropist Eloise Rodke Rees to honor her son, Mr. Kenneth Rees, recognizes a History Education student for high academic achievement. Eligibility Requirements History Education major with an emphasis in American History Minimum 3.0 overall GPA 3.5 major GPA Two letters of recommendation from faculty Participating in student teaching in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
